storyInfo: The mixed-blood offspring of Sankta and other races do not become Sankta. Cecelia is a Sankta that was not meant to become one.

attributes.content: We're almost there... Cecelia, do you know these streets?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Um... I've seen these houses before... but there's a lot of the same houses...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Did you just move here recently?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Move? I don't remember moving...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Sorry, Mister Ezell, Mamma always took me outside at night. The roads look different in the dark.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: But I like to sneak peeks out the window to see what it's like outside... so I think I can do it! I'll try...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: It's okay, Cecelia, we'll find it. We haven't reached the place I met you yet.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Eyah!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Sorry... I was looking at the houses, I didn't see you.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Hm? Aren't you that girl who fainted and went to the hospital this morning? Are you alright now?
attributes.name: Ardent Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Oh, it's you! Um, she's... she's fine.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Say, did anyone come looking for her?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I stayed on watch until noon! But nobody showed up. It's strange. What are her parents up to?
attributes.name: Ardent Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Cecelia says she lives right around here. You're sure you've never seen her?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'd definitely remember seeing such an adorable little girl! I suppose I don't need to stand around here worrying my head off anymore.
attributes.name: Ardent Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Actually, going to talk to the neighborhood hall isn't the worst idea. If her family's just moved in here, then they'll be sure to have records.
attributes.name: Ardent Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Ooh, lucky, that's Paula right there!
attributes.name: Ardent Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Seniora Paula! Over here!
attributes.name: Ardent Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Hm, what's the matter? I'm running back to the hall right now, so let's walk and talk.
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Have we had any new households move in recently?
attributes.name: Ardent Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Of course we have... but how recently are you talking?
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Do you remember roughly when you moved in, little miss?
attributes.name: Ardent Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: ...didn't just move... been living here a really long time...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Huh? Little lady, can I have your name?
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: I'm Cecelia...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Hm... that doesn't make sense. I've been working here for over a decade. If you moved in a long time ago...
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Cecelia, do you know your mama and papa's names?
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Mamma's name is... Feoria.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Wha-Wh-What? Feoria, the one on Via Thervatius? Doesn't Feoria live alone? Where did she get a child as big as you?
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: But looking at you... you do bear a strong resemblance.
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: That's odd... illegitimate, really? Cecelia, when you say you've been living here long, you mean your mama?
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Are you looking for your mama?
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Yeah, I want to find Mamma...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Well, then, senior, you must be... Feoria's relative or the like? Have you been fostering this girl out in the country? You've brought her to see her mother?
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Never saw this coming. No wonder she'd always avoid any introductions... Such a grown child, all this time.
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Excuse me, senior? Um? Are you alright?
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: We just about made it while we were talking. Feoria's house is right there. Should I knock on the door for you?
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: ...7-265, Via Thervatius.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Huh? Oh, you know the address, then.
attributes.name: Intellectual Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Yes. I do.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Mister Ezell, what's wrong? That look on your face...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I'm fine, Cecelia.... Let's get our—you—um, home for now.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Come on, let's go.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The name.
Ever since finding Cecelia, the surprises have come so fast, it slipped my mind to even ask her 'what's your mama's name?'
The name...
An ill mother, white-clothed executor, people in gowns...
How do I tell Cecelia?
Where do I take her to find her mama, now?
You're a Liberi. Why are you out to abduct a Sankta girl?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You're a Liberi. Why are you PROTECTING a Sankta girl?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I'm protecting the Commandments of Laterano.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Commandments? When have the Sankta's commandments ever actually applied to Liberi?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Fiammetta, do you seriously believe Lateran Liberi are a part of Laterano?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: What makes us not? I was born here. I grew up here.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Listen. Do you know what you're even saying, Patia?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Of course I know...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: You're the one who hasn't got it straight.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: The Liberi living in Laterano all take the Lateran Commandments as guiding principles, we believe in the 'Lateran teachings', we see Sankta as... living miracles!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Firearms, commandments, halos, empathy...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Suppose they're all Sankta miracles, sure! But do they have a single thing to do with Lateran Liberi?!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Why do the Liberi have to believe in a miracle that will never, ever come to us?!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: All of Laterano, all of the Lateran Church, belongs to nobody except the Sankta! Do you still not understand, Fiammetta?!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Do you seriously believe you've become a part of them?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Too easy!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Looks like you're not so staunch after all.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Fiammetta, Fiammetta. Think it over, carefully, I'm begging you...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I told you before I came from Iberia... do you know what it's like there? I can tell you, a lot of Iberians are even more devout than the Laterans.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: But what did they get for it?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: The people of Iberia have their fantasies of Laterano, thousands of miles away... That, I can understand.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: But why are the Lateran Liberi right there within reach, and still so delighted to give their lives for this bunch of Sankta partying about in their own closed-off golden age of forever?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Why, Fiammetta?! Tell me!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Get out of the way.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm wasting my breath, aren't I?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: You have your views, Patia.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And I have mine.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Then tell me!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Explain it! Why... would you rather chase something you know you'll never reach? Why aren't you willing to give even... one look behind?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I don't know what you're talking about.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Besides, is a smattering of words from me really going to change your mind?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: If a someone's views are so easy to change, then they can't be worth that much to begin with.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Get out of the way.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I know you're only here to stall me.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But you know you can't hold me.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: We both have work to do.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Your companions are... practically no different from any civilian. Do you want them paying the price for you?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You don't, Patia. So get out of the way, and save us both the effort.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: We're home, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Um... I don't have the key, I can't get in... Mister Ezell, can you...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Are you really okay? Do you feel bad...? You've been looking down for a while.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I'm fine. Let me get the door open...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Why did the lady just now say you actually knew our address?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia, do you recognize this firearm?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Is this—Mamma's guardian gun?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Mister Ezell... why do you have Mamma's gun...?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Cecelia...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Sorry for what...?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I don't really understand.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: You... You know where Mamma is, don't you?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Yes, I do... I'm sorry, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I don't know why I'm apologizing, either... I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Cecelia—your mother—passed away.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: She's not here anymore.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: If she's not here, where is she then? What does... 'passed away' mean?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I remember, this morning, Mamma said she was going somewhere, and she couldn't take me with her... Did you go there with her, Mister Ezell?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Can you... take me there too? Just once, just for a little bit?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I—I won't be selfish, and I'll listen to Mamma, and I won't stay there and say I won't leave... so... so...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Can you let me see Mamma one more time?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I haven't said goodbye to her yet.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Uh, what's happening? Why is she crying, Ezell? Just what did you do to a poor little girl?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Who are you? Hold on, that uniform... You're a Legatus?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Very sharp eyes, Senior Ezell.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: By order of His Holiness the Pope, I'm here to take Cecelia to the Basilica.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Whoops, forgot to introduce myself. My name's Oren Argiolas. If you want to check my identity, no harm in using your regulation terminal from the Hall there.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oh, no, forgot that too. You turned it off, didn't you?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: How did you find this place, then?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Senior Ezell, you underestimate a Legatus. You thought your movements would be hard to track? Or did you think you were so thorough, you left zero trace along the way?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Your Excellency... If you're going to take Cecelia away, can I at least ask you a few questions first?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Hahah, you're funny, senior. You think I have to answer what you ask?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But I'm not such a cruel man... so shoot.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Just who is Cecelia?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Was she... born a fallen angel?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Colorful imagination, Ezell.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But it's not as mysterious as you think.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Cecelia's mixed-blood, that's all.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What? That's not possible... A Sankta's mixed-blood child can't be a Sankta!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: There are very few cases of Sankta mixing blood with other races... but it's not rare enough to alarm the Lateran Curia...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You know the reason perfectly well, then.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Offspring of Sankta and other races don't become Sankta.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: A Sankta and Feline's child turns out Feline, a Sankta and Forte's child turns out Forte.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Mixed Sankta offspring don't get their halo and wings of light when they say their first word, and they can't empathetically sense other Sankta.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: To put it simply, they won't have any of the Sankta's distinguishing features. Without exception...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: That's the generally accepted wisdom, anyway.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Cecelia is an exception.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: She's a Sankta who shouldn't have turned out as one.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: My second question is, should Cecelia is taken to the Basilica, how the Lateran Curia will... treat her?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Don't give me that look, Ezell. If I was going to lie to you, I'd feed you a much kinder one, no problem.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But the reality's what you see. Cecelia is an 'exception.' I couldn't tell you how the Pope is going to handle this.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But this Holy Father of ours... I don't know what impression you have of him, but, well.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: At least, as I'm given to understand, he's not known to use extreme methods.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: And look at how cute Cecelia is. How hardhearted would someone have to be to harm her, right?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Third question.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I cannot entirely trust your answers... I wish to accompany Cecelia to the Basilica.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Um, is that a question?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Sorry, but that's the one 'question' you'll have to forgive my answer on...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oren, what are you doing here?
